title: Vazhkkai Unnai Lyrics Pulivaal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Vazhkkai Unnai
Singer(s): Harihara Sudhan
Movie: Pulivaal
Music : N.R.Raghurathan

Vazhakai unnai odavidum
varaimurai indri aadavidum
Neenda dhooram odiya pinney
nenju koodu vaadiyapinney
thappaana thisaiendru thagaval tharum.

Dhooram kadandhu vandhaal thaaney
oorai sera mudiyum.
Uyarama thaandi vandhaal thaaney
thuyaram thaanda mudiyum. ....(Vazhakai unnai)

Vidhaigal thammai alikkaamal
vergal enbadhu kidayaadhu.
Viyarvai enbadhai ilakkaamal
vettri enbadhu kidayaadhu.

Thaedi ponadhu veru nee
thaedi adaivadhu veru.
Yedho ondrai adayumpodhu
yedhuvo thozhaiyum paaru.

Manidhan podum kanakkil
ellaaam sariyum thavarum undu
kaalam podum kanakil ellaam
sarigal mattumey undu.

unadhu kanakkum kaalakkanukkum
othu ponaal nandru. .....(Vazhakai unnai )

NItham kutram puriginraai
ninaithukooda magizhkindraai.
ellaa kannum thoonguvadhaai
innoru kuttram ilaikindrai.

Paavam enbadhu un kuppai
adhu nitham serum paaru.
paavakuppai ellaam kooti
payirukku uramaai podu.

Karumbu kattil yaanai pugundhaal
yedhuvum illai mitcham.
yaanai kadhil erumbu nulaindhaal
adhuve thuyarin utchcham.

Madiyil kanamey illai enndraal
vazhil yedhu atchcham....(Vazhakai unnai )
